About me

I am a graduate student pursuing my M.S in Software School at Dalian University of Technology (China). And I completed my undergraduate studies at there on July 2011 Currently, I am researching on Machine learning and Data Mining. My advisor is Associate Prof.Piao yong. I apply machine learning techniques to problems in XML structure mining.

About this site

The site is generated from Markdown-formatted text written with Emacs and Markdown-Mode and stored in a repository on my Github. I have used the templates made by Mark Reid.

The design of this site is released under the Creative Commons Attribution Non-Commercial Share alike 3.0 license, but the content itself may not be reproduced without permission except in accordance with fair-use.
